titleStmt.title: Concerning the upright and good conversation of the saints in Christ and in Heaven
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Bringhurst, printer and bookseller, at the sign of the Book in Grace-Church-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Friends' House Library, London.
